# Introduction

Tidy Tuesday assignment #9 on digital publications from 2022-04-05 data.

# Load libraries 
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(here)
library(rcartocolor)
library(showtext)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(patchwork)
library(gganimate)
```

# Load data
```{r}
i_calls <- read_csv(here("Tidy_Tuesday_9/data","internal_calls.csv"))
e_calls <- read_csv(here("Tidy_Tuesday_9/data","external_calls.csv"))
glimpse(i_calls)
glimpse(e_calls)
view(i_calls)
view(e_calls)
```
